14#pragma once
15
16/*! \file isc/string.h */
17
18#include <string.h>
19
20#include "isc/platform.h"
21#include "isc/lang.h"
22
23ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
24
25#if !defined(HAVE_STRLCPY)
26size_t
27strlcpy(char *dst, const char *src, size_t size);
28#endif /* !defined(HAVE_STRLCPY) */
29
30#if !defined(HAVE_STRLCAT)
31size_t
32strlcat(char *dst, const char *src, size_t size);
33#endif
34
35int
36isc_string_strerror_r(int errnum, char *buf, size_t buflen);
37
38ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
